snippet: Aleksei A. Navalny’s improbable campaign for mayor of Moscow has exposed disarray in President Vladimir V. Putin’s carefully constructed political system.
abstract: Improbable mayoral campaign of corruption-fighting Russian activist Aleksei A Navalny has exposed disarray in the political system Pres Vladimir V Putin has constructed; Navalny and his supporters have faced harassment and threats of new criminal investigations, revealing what many view as growing schisms among Putin's closest circle of advisers.

byline.contributor: Andrew Roth and Noah Sneider contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Aleksei A. Navalny’s improbable campaign for mayor of Moscow has exposed disarray in President Vladimir V. Putin’s carefully constructed political system.

headline.main: Mayoral Run by Putin Critic Vexes Kremlin
headline.print_headline: Mayoral Run By Putin Critic Vexes Kremlin
